name: Close Tear
description: Closes a tear in reality and transfers energy to the caster.

name: Meditation
description: Meditation leaves you weary for the day.

name: Inundate Vaultism
description: A spell of great importance which can be used to clear the area around the caster of 'vault atmosphere,' a corporate effect used to limit teleportation. A highly illegal (and coveted) spell.

name: Prepared Professional's Puff
description: Never leave home without it! One quick squeeze of the palm and you'll save the whole office! Never fear a fire again, buy it today.

name: Spy Ward
description: You project a ward all around you that detonates, creating fields of magical energy that interfere with invisibility.

name: Yank
description: You intertwine your spirit with a target's and bind them locally, pulling the target closer to you.

name: Indirected Mana Prone
description: You let a large amount of raw mana flow outwards.

name: Indirected Mana Prone
description: You let a large amount of raw mana flow outwards.

name: Indirected Mana
description: You let a large amount of raw mana flow outwards at will, toppling those around you and sending objects flying.

name: Directed Mana
description: You allow a small amount of mana to leak into your spiritual resevoir, which causes a violent reaction resulting in a blast of raw mana flying out of your hand or a sufficient at-hand magical directory. Doing so drains your inner resource for the day and the sudden burst has a liquid nitrogen-like effect on your hand. Adept mages were said to be able to avoid this drawback at one time.

name: Meditation Sickness
description: Meditation leaves you weary for the day.

name: Frozen Hand
desc: Your hand has been frozen, making combat much more difficult.

description: You let a small amount of raw mana flow outwards.

name: Shove
description: You push someone back.

name: Shove Forward
description: You push someone back.

name: Shove
description: You push someone back and down.

name: Shove
description: You push someone down.

name: Center of Gravity
description: Pulls everything nearby toward the caster.

name: Casual Paradigm
description: Your morning routine, wherein you make yourself presentable, done in a flash. It's not make up ( and it's technically not your face), but the process is very similar.

name: Levitate
description: You can't go up, but you could fall much faster. Through some means, you gain the ability to float, fly or levitate magically. Doing so tires out your spirit.

name: Levitate
description: You can't go up, but you could fall much faster. Through some means, you gain the ability to float, fly or levitate magically. Doing so tires out your spirit.

name: Meditation Sickness
description: Meditation leaves you weary for the day.

name: Levitate
description: You can't go up, but you could fall much faster. Through some means, you gain the ability to float, fly or levitate magically. Doing so tires out your spirit.

name: Marinate
description: You make yourself more adept in aquatic environments.

name: Brain Freeze
description: You make yourself much duller in the head, but ignore heat because of it.

name: Balance
description: You hear her voice like an angel's...

name: Random Fireball
description: You hurl a pea-sized glowing orb that when reaches its target or an obstacle produces a pressure-less blast of searing heat.

name: Cause Cow
description: A mossy green troll pulls itself free from the earth.

name: Cause Troll
description: A mossy green troll pulls itself free from the earth.

name: Cause Horror
description: A creature of black flesh with horrid, rotting skin materializes from shadow.

name: Cause Bluelight
description: A blue light touches the earth with cold abandon.
message: Stale blue light floods the world, and reality stands still.

name: Integrated Intranervous Depot
description: You have hardwired your bionic power supply into your central nervous system, allowing you to jumpstart it with your own pain.

name: Devil's Reach
description: You reach out a hand, and at your call the underworld tugs on human spirits in an area, causing serious pain.

name: Integrated Intranervous Depot
description: You have hardwired your bionic power supply into your central nervous system, allowing you to jumpstart it with your own pain.

name: Anti-Ballistic Field
description: You shunt potential protective energy into the space around you, making yourself immune to bullets for a short period of time.

name: Integrated Neurological Bracing
description: Marketed as 'The end of energy needs,' this spell drains bionic electric in order to magically precipitate a mesh over the brain which 'jump-starts' it, restoring the user's stamina.

name: Integrated Overcharge Complex - Light
description: You have a magically enhanced nervous system capable of linking to a battery and discharging your own bionic power through it. Doing so destroys the battery but causes a projectile explosion. This version uses light batteries.

name: Integrated Overcharge Complex - Medium
description: You have a magically enhanced nervous system capable of linking to a battery and discharging your own bionic power through it. Doing so destroys the battery but causes a projectile explosion. This version uses medium batteries.

name: Integrated Overcharge Complex - Heavy
description: You have a magically enhanced nervous system capable of linking to a battery and discharging your own bionic power through it. Doing so destroys the battery but causes a projectile explosion. This version uses heavy batteries.

name: Integrated Overcharge Complex - Huge
description: You have a magically enhanced nervous system capable of linking to a battery and discharging your own bionic power through it. Doing so destroys the battery but causes a projectile explosion. This version uses huge batteries.

name: Integrated Automatic Tazer
description: You conjure a small, automatic electric turret that draws from your bionic power supply.

name: Automatic Taze
description: Zzzap

name: Entrapment
description: Through the power of either red tape or money you damn a group of creatures to the fate of legal prosecution.

name: Extract Memory
description: You delve into the recesses of another's mind, sifting for anything of use. Barbaric, and taxing on the soul, if not effective.

name: Extract Memory
description: You delve into the recesses of another's mind, sifting for anything of use. Barbaric, and taxing on the soul, if not effective.

name: Extract Memory
description: You delve into the recesses of another's mind, sifting for anything of use. Barbaric, and taxing on the soul, if not effective.

name: Extracted Memory
description: You harvest the data residing somewhere deeply hidden.

name: Extracted Memory
description: You harvest the data residing somewhere deeply hidden.

name: Cause Slow
description: A blue light touches the earth with cold abandon.
message: Stale blue light floods the world, and reality stands still.

name: Cause life
description: A white light touches skin with warm affection.

name: Airlift
description: You're not a cowboy, but on a steel horse you ride regardless. Cash only.

name: Airlift
description: You're not a cowboy, but on a steel horse you ride regardless. Cash only.

name: Semi-Truck
description: You're not a cowboy, but on a steel horse you ride regardless. Cash only.

name: Ship
description: You're not a cowboy, but on a steel horse you ride regardless. Cash only.

name: Mojo Baby
description: You're not a cowboy, but on a steel horse you ride regardless. Cash only.

name: Beep Beep
description: You click down the hood on the black car-d and a modest sedan appears in front of you. Also accepts cash.

name: Beauty of Bicycles
description: Ever had to drag your bike down a flight of stairs every morning? Ever have to bring it back up? Well, never again! With the Beauty of Bicycles! It even seats a friend.

name: Weekender's Worryless Watercraft
description: No need for pesky storage or maintenance.

name: Kelkemmemmnon's Heavenly Flames
description: You locate and destroy a target area.

name: Artillery
description: You locate and destroy a target area.

name: Artillery
description: You locate and destroy a target area. Due to budget constraints you'll have to pay for this strafe yourself. Cash only!

name: Artillery
description: You locate and destroy a target area. Due to budget constraints you'll have to pay for this strafe yourself. Cash only!

name: Sunny Disposition
description: You trap another version of yourself in a mirror dimension, creating a pendant capable of changing hearts and minds.

name: Bend Will
description: You create a charm that may ensnare creatures in their love for you. This process drains your spirit, and costs you a symbol of friendship.

name: Bend Will
description: You use a charm that's extremely enthralling to bend the will of a creature.

name: Bend Will
description: You use a charm that's extremely enthralling to bend the will of a creature.

name: Bend Will
description: You use a charm that's extremely enthralling to bend the will of a creature.

name: Bend Will
description: You use a charm that's extremely enthralling to bend the will of a creature.

name: Bend Will
description: You ensnare a monster in it's love for you. This process drains your spirit, and costs you a delicious fruit.

name: Maintain Will
description: You're so sweet, you could get anybody to love you! Reassert your dominance over an already broken mind.

name: Pocket Sniper
description: You transform almost any pistol into a machine of deadly accuracy and impossible grace. A chassis with sight and bayonet included turns your weapon into something truly magnificent.

name: Transtemporal Passage
description: You hone your mana into crystallized form then infuse it with your intimate knowledge of translocation, creating a quickly dissolving transtemporal pass. Leaves you feeling pretty drained, professionally speaking.

name: Congealed Mass
description: Like a scab, you just have to pick.

name: Salt and Spirit
description: You call the ashes, and from them come the brood.

name: Muckreation
description: From muck and sewage here we come, here we come...

name: New Life
description: You begin experimenting with your pets, magically pushing them to greater heights.

name: Old Life
description: You force life back into a corpse. The less life they had in them to begin with the more likely it will work.

name: Catalyst
description: You catalyze your own body to force someone to mutate. Doing so releases a cloud of disgusting rot all around you, forcing yourself and those around you to vomit.

name: Catalyst
description: You catalyze your own body to force someone to mutate. Doing so releases a cloud of disgusting rot all around you, forcing yourself and those around you to vomit.

name: Induced Guilt
description: You expel a putrid black cloud from your body, inducing guilt from most sane creatures.

name: Induced Vomiting
description: You expel a putrid black cloud from your body, inducing vomiting from most sane creatures.

name: Greater Banishment
description: A more advanced version of Banishment, which is a ritual spell that attempts to banish a monster.  Being closely related to blood magic, the Blood Mage is much more specialized to use a spell like this.

name: Congeal
description: You animate a corpse to further life, unsaddling it's soul but forcing it to continue in your name.

name: Dissipate
description: You cause a captured to lose some reality, fading into the void but forgetting earthly troubles.

name: Unburn
description: You burn your horde down and start anew, a better pet crawling from it's ashes.

name: Gelate
description: You steal the energy from other captured souls, reparing a creatures body with the energy of another's will.

name: Bind Via Blood
description: You use blood to bind a weakened creature, summoning it's soul in a simulacrum under your control. Consumes a book of blood or a little capital.

name: Bind Via Smoke
description: You trap a creatures soul in smoke, summoning it in a simulacrum under your control. Consumes a book of smoke or some legal tender.

name: Bind Via Bile
description: You lure a creature into a terrible trap, holding it's soul hostage to conjure in a corporeal form. Consumes a book of bile or some guala.

name: GM Fiat
description: Per the Big Book, you roll a die and 'give it your heart and soul. Realities will intersect, causing a drastic change in what you thought you knew about someone.'

name: Bind Via Flame
description: You burn whatever's left of a creature, tying the last remnant of it's soul to your will and forcing it into a new, burned body. Consumes a book of flame or a little dosh.

name: What Remains
description: You burn a magic circle and whatever's left from the other side comes drifting down into your world to serve you.

name: Sewage Overflow
description: You pull vile, pus and bile leaking zombies from the nether realm to serve you.

name: Sewage Overflow
description: You pull vile, pus and bile leaking zombies from the nether realm to serve you.

name: The Fall
description: The flames grow, and as they do a monstrous hand reaches through them as if crawling out of some ever present pit, unending and dark.

name: Conjure Crystal Circle
description: Magic has become so infused into the language of your being that you simply can simply speak magic into existence.

name: Conjure Circle of Blood
description: Utilitzing a massive burst of mana you conjure a circle of blood into existence.

name: Conjure Circle of Bile
description: Utilitzing a massive burst of mana you conjure a circle of bile into existence.

name: Conjure Circle of Smoke
description: Utilitzing a massive burst of mana you conjure a circle of smoke into existence.

name: Conjure Circle of Flame
description: Utilitzing a massive burst of mana you conjure a circle of flame into existence.

name: Magical Drive
description: You spend mana to keep yourself going.

name: 52 Card
description: A simple thrown card can do more damage than most people realize.

name: 52 Card
description: The attacks for 52 card shuffle.

name: 52 Card
description: The attacks for 52 card shuffle.

name: 52 Card Shuffle
description: You infuse a deck of cards with mana, and in an uproarious, thunderous torrent they magically assault everyone in the area, including yourself.

name: Random Fireball
description: You hurl a pea-sized glowing orb that when reaches its target or an obstacle produces a pressure-less blast of searing heat.

name: Spirit Cloak
description: You use your psychic prowess and set your spirit adrift in the void between space, making yourself unnoticeable by those still on the physical plane. You remain tethered enough to be harmed, and to bring yourself back.
message: You slowly lose touch with reality until it loses touch with you as well.

name: Shatter Signet
description: All things are one as black becomes white.

name: Homeward
description: You sit in quiet contemplation of somewhere far away, and soon enough you find yourself there.

name: Meditation Sickness
description: Meditation leaves you weary for the day.

name: Hat Trick
description: And for my next trick...

name: Puddle
description: Pinch yourself, you must be dreaming! The perfect spell for pranking your friends! Put down a puddle and watch 'em go! All terms and conditions may apply only hurts you as much as it hurts them.

name: Puddle Pain
description: Pinch yourself, you must be dreaming! The perfect spell for pranking your friends! Put down a puddle and watch 'em go!

name: Hellfire
description: Tear at your life force, spilling your inner fire from your heart and all around you.

name: Magician's Magic Hat
description: You quickly stitch a magical hat capable of carrying plenty, and looking stylish while doing it. Can also be purchased with cash.

name: Fuel 'er Up
description: You turn your mana directly into gasoline, at traditionally exhorbitant prices. In the fine print you see 'Cash Only.'

name: Cooling Breeze
description: Projects a light puff of cold air.

name: Freezing Presence
description: Projects a strong puff of cold air.

name: Warmth
description: Projects a light puff of hot air.

name: Burning Presence
description: Projects a strong puff of hot air.

name: Distraction
description: Ever needed to get out of a conversation, fast? Then this is the spell for you! Uses a small amount of mana and your inner willpower to create a much-needed diversion.

name: Meditation Sickness
description: Meditation leaves you weary for the day.

name: Puddle of Acid
description: Creates puddles of acid.

name: Conjure Storm
description: Calls down a storm near you.

name: Coldlight Flashbang
description: Causes a freezing flashbang at the target. Due to budget constraints, operators will have to pay for the spell out of their own pocket.
message: A freezing light floods the area.

name: Coldlflash Smoke
description: Projects a light puff of smoke.

name: Coldlflash Cold Air
description: Projects a light puff of cold.

name: Meditation
description: You spend time in a deep meditation, fatiguing your body in exchange for mana.

name: Meditation Sickness
description: Meditation leaves you weary for the day.

name: Will to Power
description: You pull on the firey core burning deep inside you, draining yourself for the day but producing a wellspring of mana.

name: Will to Power
description: You pull on the firey core burning deep inside you, draining yourself for the day but producing a wellspring of mana.

name: Divergence from Reality
description: You flip the coin at the perfect moment, and as it disappears you feel like something has changed for the better.

name: Coldlight Time Stop
description: Throws a coldlight flashbang, freezing and blinding your enemies.
message: Stale golden light floods the world, and reality stands still.

name: Lab Work
description: No animals were harmed in the CASTING of this spell.

name: Remove Illusory Suit
description: With a snap you can make your illusory suit disappear.

name: Reanimate Golem
description: Due to their elastic nature, you are able to take from the pieces of broken plastic golems, returning them to life by charging their core with brimstone. No guarantee what it will do from there.

name: Leap
description: You leap, perhaps across a gap or forward through a crowd of zombies. Whatever the case, you push your body to move quickly. Say no if asked if you'd like to step into ledge, one time required for each ledge in the gap.

name: Hurried Gait
description: Trip

name: Professional's Hurried Gait
description: Most civilized people know how to thrust themselves forward with a quick burst of mana. Most people don't know how to walk it off.

name: Gather Strength
description: You stop and build up your strength, becoming stronger for a short period of time. Doing so leaves you slightly more drained for the day than just attacking normally.

name: Shoulder Charge
description: You charge forward, knocking your foes down and away.

name: First Things First
description: Advertised as 'the first full clothing replacement,' purchase of this spell would provide 'A smoke, a sip, and a suit.' Everything one needs to get the day started right.

name: Illusory Suit
description: Advertised as 'the first full clothing replacement,' purchase of this spell would provide 'A smoke, a sip, and a suit.' Everything one needs to get the day started right.

name: flick
description: Spawns illusory clothing.

name: flick
description: Spawns illusory clothing.

name: flick
description: Spawns illusory clothing.

name: flick
description: Spawns illusory clothing.

name: flick
description: Spawns illusory clothing.

name: flick
description: Spawns illusory clothing.

name: flick
description: Spawns illusory clothing.

name: flick
description: Spawns illusory clothing.

name: Double Trouble
description: 'Spend your mana in the wisest way a man can.'

name: flick
description: The accompanying flame for your smoke.

name: flick
description: The accompanying cuppa for your smoke.

name: flick
description: The accompanying mug for your coffee.

name: flick
description: The accompanying cuppa for your smoke.

name: Miscipula Brachiumorphus
description: Using nearly a gallon of water you carefully cultivate a living organism from your own flesh, and after a few moments it grows into a massive, spitting and snarling plant similar to a venus fly trap. Using it will rip a chunk out of the earth to be swallowed whole.

name: Supplemental Growth
description: You make yourself much larger, tougher, stronger, and slower. Needs something to make you grow, cash growth included.

name: Enlargement
description: You make yourself much larger, tougher, stronger, and slower for a small period of time.

name: Spirit Walk
description: Momentarily plunge into the underworld, and swap positions with any spirit you command.

name: Spear of the White Wolf
description: You call on the spirit of the white wolf and are granted it's blessing.

name: spawn crystallized mana
description: The accompanying mana for your spear.

name: spawn spear strap
description: The accompanying strap for your spear.

name: Instantaneous Camp
description: The more magical version of the ever popular Instant Camp. Uses a LOT more mana, but still accomplishes about the same thing.

name: Instant Camp
description: Instantly creates everything one might need to sleep well. Requires a symbol of home, or some green.

name: Precipitate Bed
description: Utilitzing a massive burst of mana you conjure a bed into existence.

name: ear plugs
description: The accompanying ear plugs for your camp.

name: portable game
description: The accompanying gameboy for your camp.

name: sleeping pill
description: The accompanying sleeping pill for your camp.

name: apple cider
description: The accompanying apple cider for your camp.

name: down blanket
description: The accompanying down blanket for your camp.

name: toothbrush
description: The accompanying toothbrush for your camp.

name: blindfold
description: The accompanying blindfold for your camp.

name: pillow
description: The accompanying pillow for your camp.

name: Holographic Transposition
description: Allows you to swap places with a previously existing holographic image of yourself.  If the universe itself can't tell you apart, who could?

name: Summon Steed
description: Survival not guaranteed. Retack the steed to remount it.

name: Greater Summon Steed
description: Survival not guaranteed. Retack the steed to remount it.

name: Summon Steed
description: Survival not guaranteed. Retack the steed to remount it.

name: Spur Steed
description: You inject your steed with mana, forcing it to move at blazing speeds.

name: Steed
description: Makes the target a pet.

name: Steed's Eat
description: The accompanying food for your steed

name: Steed's Saddle
description: The accompanying saddle for your steed

name: Leash
description: The accompanying leash for your steed

name: Soft Step
description: You magically are able to step softly, making far less noise than usual.

name: Precipitate Rope
description: You never know when you'll need it, but what you DO know is that you WILL need it! Buy it today!!!

name: Fido's Best Friend
description: You never know when you'll need it, but what you DO know is that you WILL need it! Buy it today!!!

name: Unravel
description: Only the absolute best in customer satisfaction. Choose wisely, choose safety.

name: Unravel
description: Only the absolute best in customer satisfaction. Choose wisely, choose safety.

name: Cider by FoodplaceTM
description: This spell, originally an ad campaign to try and sell an overstockage of apple cider, was taken off store shelves in record time (literally) after consumers realized it equated to free food.

name: Commuter's Choice
description: Only the absolute best in customer satisfaction. Choose wisely, choose safety.

name: Precipitate Flask
description: Nowhere to put that bacon grease? Just wanna smash something? Buy it. Now.

name: Precipitate Wire
description: Originally marketed to electricians, the price of this spell was raised exponentially when the populace discovered how downright useful it was.

name: Precipitate String
description: Originally marketed to tailors, the price of this spell was raised exponentially when the populace discovered how downright useful it was.

name: Precipitate Fish Bait
description: How much do you spend a year on fish bait? Wanna never spend anything again? Invest in yourself.

name: Precipitate Mirror
description: A spell everyone needs and not enough have; A simple flick of the wrist and you'll be able to see every imperfection.

name: Precipitate Washing Kit
description: A spell everyone needs and not enough have; Never let yourself fall flat into embarassment again.

name: Precipitate Mask
description: The company responsible for this spell later apologized and recalled it, citing 'consumer irresponsibility.'

name: Precipitate Phone
description: You may already never leave home without it, but now you can't! Take the worry out of life; precipitate your problems away!

name: Home Surgeon's Essentials
description: The company responsible for this spell later apologized and recalled it, citing 'consumer irresponsibility.' Historically, this spell was the subject of the first legal battle revolving around magic and it's properties. The corporation faced no penalty, but it's use was banned throughout the country.

name: Realign Pigment
description: You use mana to forceably realign the tint of the colors running through your body, setting you into a state of color equilibrium. Color drapes you like a cloak.

name: Realign Pigment
description: You use mana to forceably realign the tint of the colors running through your body, setting you into a state of color equilibrium. Color drapes you like a cloak.

name: Realign Pigment
description: You use mana to forceably realign the tint of the colors running through your body, setting you into a state of color equilibrium. Color drapes you like a cloak.

name: Realign Pigment
description: You use mana to forceably realign the tint of the colors running through your body, setting you into a state of color equilibrium. Color drapes you like a cloak.

name: Realign Pigment
description: You use mana to forceably realign the tint of the colors running through your body, setting you into a state of color equilibrium. Color drapes you like a cloak.

name: Realign Pigment
description: You use mana to forceably realign the tint of the colors running through your body, setting you into a state of color equilibrium. Color drapes you like a cloak.

name: Precipitate Manipulation
description: Through sheer magical power you create a charm that may ensnare creatures in their love for you.

name: Untether Mana
description: You unleash your mana into the stars and then bind it back down to the Earth, raining pure destruction.

name: Mutamanation
description: Discovered in the 1800s, this spell has been used by fools and glory-seekers alike to try and gain an upper hand. A huge burst of mana applied correctly to the ley-lines of your body will cause you to mutate once a second for the next thirteen seconds. It's your own mana, so they say you have a fair chance of making it out alive.

name: Mutamanation
description: You infuse your body with so much mana that you start rapidly mutating with no control of the outcome.

name: Call to Oneness
description: You pull upon the innate connection that lay in all things natural, and they respond to your call.

name: Sacrificial Bloom
description: You tear yourself into pieces as blood sacrifice. Death responds in kind.

This spell somehow both maintains 'you' and displaces 'you.' Effectively it will keep you safe from harm for a short while, but it also has the side effect of clearing common capitalist deterrents from your soul.

This spell somehow both maintains 'you' and displaces 'you.' Effectively it will keep you safe from harm for a short while, but it also has the side effect of clearing the common capitalist deterrent known as 'vault atmosphere' from your soul.

name: Gambit
description: You choose to plunge two spirits into the underworld and swap their places in the phsyical world.

name: Forced Hand
description: You spin the wheel in such a way that two beings trade places, and all it costs you is mana and time.

name: Shadow Realm
description: Cast a realm of intense shadows.

name: Shadow Realm
description: Create a cloud of thick shadow all around you and temporarily gain the ability to see in the dark.

name: Shadow Sight
description: Gives you the power to see in the dark.
message: Your eyes glow green for a moment.  Now your sight can pierce the darkest shadows.

name: Sever Connection
description: You use a tremendous burst of mana like a hot knife, severing your connection to reality and instantly cauterizing the wound, coming out the other end feeling only slightly different from before. During this brief instant, the caster may witness literally anything. The risks involved should be obvious.

name: Sever Connection
description: You use a tremendous burst of mana like a hot knife, severing your connection to reality and instantly cauterizing the wound, coming out the other end feeling only slightly different from before. During this brief instant, the caster may witness literally anything. The risks involved should be obvious.

name: Dimensional Resonance
description: Via vibrational resonance you slowly transport yourself to a target location. Losing and regaining coporeality requires you to drain your spirit for the day.

name: Meditation Sickness
description: Meditation leaves you weary for the day.

name: Scrying
description: You meditate for some time, and find the answers you seek.

name: Scrying
description: You meditate for some time, and find the answers you seek.

name: Crystal Gaze
description: You meditate for some time, and find the answers you seek.
You gaze into the watchful eye and see that it is blind.

name: Scrying
description: You meditate for some time, and find the answers you seek. Requires a symbol of insight, or cash.

name: Intense Gaze
description: You have, at least to some degree, mastered the art of scrying. Your eye has been trained enough that you may now pour mana directly into it, subverting the need for a focus or time in meditation. The most powerful of ancient wizards were said to be able to do so, as well as holding crystal balls in their high towers. Those that weren't blind simply faded into complete invisibility, staring into them for hours, days, even weeks just crystallizing mana and sleeping...

name: Let Loose
description: You drain your will to set yourself temporarily adrift in space.
message: The world loses coherence, with images of nearby places forming and disappearing around you.

name: Paradox Shield
description: You mix mana and spirit, encasing yourself in a localized paradox and becoming completely intangible for some time. Unfortunately, you cannot move for most of said time.

name: Meditation Sickness
description: Meditation leaves you weary for the day.

name: zhonya
description: Freezes the target in space.

A focused torrent of mana applied carefully to your spirit places it in a place of focused quantum instability, causing you to rapidly teleport when attacked. Doing so requires sacrificing a sufficient focus to your own spirit.

name: Psychic Anchor
description: You have loosely learned how to tether your consciousness to itself. Using mana to aid your meditation you set yourself into a state where you feel more resistant to psychic or portal-based attacks.

name: Loose Anchor
description: You have honed your ability to tether your consciousness, draining a small amount of your daily spirit in exchange for a psychic anchor that will not limit teleportation.

name: Sever Connection
description: You use a tremendous burst of mana like a hot knife, severing your connection to reality and instantly cauterizing the wound, coming out the other end feeling only slightly different from before. During this brief instant, the caster may witness literally anything. The risks involved should be obvious.

name: Estrangement
description: You use mana to cut your tie to the physical realm and enter the one below. Once you're there you cut someone else's tie, effectively swaping places with a random creature nearby. Horrible things flood your mind at the sight of them.

name: Semi-Typhlotic Estrangement
description: By closing your inner eye you've learned how to swap places with a nearby creature almost instantaneously and without risk of witnessing a horror.

name: Anti-Vibrational Field
description: For a brief period of time you bind targets in an area locally, revealing them and making movement or teleportation impossible.

name: Rabbit's Foot
remove_message: You return to your normal speed.

name: Rabbit's Foot
description: You imbue your feet with raw quickness, perhaps growing an actual rabbit's foot or some other appendage. Whatever the case you wish you'd brought better shoes, or at least something to stave off the jitters. Good luck, anyway.

name: Rabbit's Foot
description: You imbue your feet with raw quickness, perhaps growing an actual rabbit's foot or some other appendage. However the spell is shaped, it's time to go.

name: Righteous Endeavor
description: You begin a ritual to lift spirits and bring some hope into this horrid world. You put your heart and soul into a speech, or a show or some other such act, draining you but accomplishing your goal.

name: Meditation Sickness
description: Meditation leaves you weary for the day.

name: Abolish Spirit
description: You sever a ghost's connection to the phsyical realm, forcing it to face the fate it has so woefully avoided.

name: Cleansing of Lost Souls
description: You push a lost spirit into the realm beyond, granting them peace and obtaining their everlasting favor in return. Their ghost thanks you as it passes.

name: Devil's Tax
description: Got ya.

name: Soul Cleansing
description: You cleanse a ghost's soul.

name: Soul Binder's Grasp
description: You rend the soul from a creature's body, banishing it to the lower planes and then solidifying it's spirit. Doing so leaves you drained for the day.

name: Spawn decaying soul
description: You tear the soul from a creature's body.

name: Lover of Flame
description: You stare into the flames and they stare back smiling. You become more resistant to heat.

name: Lover of Ice
description: The winds of winter pass straight through you. Nothing could turn you any colder.

name: Lover of Life
description: Cells, that's all they are. Stacked on top of one another. You learn to love yourself more.

name: Lover of Shock
description: You are one with smoke and vapor, your life no longer sparking as violently as it once did.

name: Love
description: You put yourself out there and see what the universe returns. Hope you're ready for a commitment.

name: Lovely Aura
description: You resist mundane effects like bashing, stabbing and cutting.

name: Lovely Aura
description: You're sick with love.

name: Anti-Vibrational Field
description: You create a localized anti-vibrational field, locking those inside when the spell is cast in place for a brief period of time.

name: Silent Self
description: You've always been more attuned to magic than others, and have been capable of forcing it into silence. This presence of magic inside of you is always at peaceful rest, and you know enough to fear it's wrath should you ever push it too far.

name: Subtle Self
description: You've always been more attuned to magic than others, and have been capable of supressing it into motionlessness. This presence of magic inside of you is always at peaceful rest, and you know enough to fear it's wrath should you ever push it too far.

name: Precipitate Crystal
description: You refract light through a diamond, pulling it into the material realm and solidifying it into pure light. Legends say the most adept mages are able to do so without shattering the diamond in the process.

name: Precipitate Crystal
description: You refract light through a diamond, pulling it into the material realm and solidifying it into pure light. Legends say the most adept mages are able to do so without shattering the diamond in the process.

name: Meditation
description: You regain fatigue.

name: Hired Help
description: You offer money in exchange for otherworldy assitance.

name: Meditation Sickness
description: Meditation leaves you weary for the day.

name: Prayer of the Faithful
description: You say a prayer to your Self. If that's still someone you trust, they might reward you for it.

name: Prayer
description: You simply pray. Has the occassional tendency to leave you in awe.

name: Prayer
description: You simply pray. Has the occassional tendency to leave you in awe.

name: Prayer
description: You simply pray. Has the occassional tendency to leave you in awe.

name: Meditation
description: Meditation leaves you weary for the day.

name: Flesh and Blood
description: Meditation leaves you weary for the day.

name: Flesh and Blood
description: Meditation leaves you weary for the day.

name: Stunned Awe
description: Meditation leaves you weary for the day.

name: Stunned Awe
description: Meditation leaves you weary for the day.

false_effect.u_message: The sky darkens and the winds howl with delighted violence, a horn blowing somewhere in the distance. You have obviously done something horribly wrong.

name: Wicked Ritual
description: 'Come only ye truly wicked, or ye who bow by feint nature of heart, for Power gained justly is Power distraught. Blood, oh blood, that first ask of all. Sacrifice no other than enough of what you call your own. The chain stands to break even time everlasting: Face off against Zeus with no fear of judgement passing. The space in between holds the key to all knowledge: Call out for my aid when the moment is longest. Death, oh sweet Death, how she yearns for reunion: If Power ye seek, then lay with her in communion. Truest cleansing awaits they who perform this ritual: When the pieces combine all else becomes spiritual.'

name: Altar of Power
description: You transform a symbol of power, such as a magic circle or boulder-sized crystal into an altar of power.

name: Meditation Sickness
description: Meditation leaves you weary for the day.

name: Sacred Chain's Link
description: The chain shines with golden light as you hold it aloft.
message: A golden light holds even time still.

name: Spatial Superiority
description: You choose to plunge two spirits into the underworld and swap their places in the phsyical world.
message: Space reorients itself around your desire.

name: Chained Chronology
description: You have time bound to your will.
message: The universe alters someone's space/time, granting them a few moments of true freedom.

name: Risky Inscription
description: You hastily use an extra dosage of mana to try and work around the arduous process of Precipitating a Gate. Doing so leaves you feeling drained for the day, and you have no way of knowing what might come through the other side...

name: Precipitate Gate
description: You burst mana through the eye of a ring, creating a translocation circle. Doing so leaves you feeling drained for the day.
